first.name: Nostoc
first.content: Hey, I'm Nostoc, an apprentice machinist.@I create and maintain the infrastructure here.

2.content: ...Can you hear that?@There's this really irritating noise coming from inside this terrarium.

3.content: Is it coming from the lightbulbs?@...One of the pipesâ€½

repeat.name: Nostoc
repeat.content: ...I used to work as a Catstronaut, but often found myself missing life on the ring.
